mosinstall.name: mXcommentBot
mosinstall.author: Bernard Gilly
mosinstall.license: This component is released under Creative Commons License. All rights reserved.
mosinstall.description: Replaces {mxc} tag in content item or load mXcomment in automatic mode

param.name: notShowOnFrontEnd
param.label: Disabled on front-end
param.description: Not show mXcomment on front-end, just in content.

param.name: notShowOnIntro
param.label: Disabled on intro
param.description: Not show mXcomment on intro, run just on full content.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: Options availables with Joom!fish
param.description: Options below available only with Joom!fish, require installation of Joom!fish component.

param.name: disabledChoiceLang
param.label: Disabled language choice comments
param.description: Disabled language choice on show comments. Require Joom!fish component.

param.name: forceKeywordsLang
param.label: Force original(s) keyword(s)
param.description: Force original(s) keyword(s) if not exists in content translation. Require Joom!fish component.
